author: kskovpen
body: Backport of #16849 to 81X. It introduces a muon filter applied at G4 level to avoid the generator filter bias. Backport is needed to request the official dataset production. More information is available here: https://indico.cern.ch/event/579787/contributions/2349956/attachments/1361189/2061022/kskovpenBTV20161026.pdf
title: Add SIM muon filter
